title: Fort Vancouver National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Hours of Operation Facilities at Fort Vancouver NHS, including the reconstructed fort, Pearson Air Museum, and the Visitor Center, will be open Tuesdays through Saturdays, 9 am to 5 pm, and closed Sundays and Mondays.Park grounds will remain open seven days a week from dawn until dusk.The park's Administrative Headquarters, other park management offices located elsewhere on site, and library and museum collections will be open Monday through Friday by appointment during regular business hours.Permitted events and activities will continue throughout the national park, seven days a week, including popular venues such as the Historic Hangar at Pearson Air Museum, the bandstand on the Parade Ground, the Heritage Oak, and the trail to/from the Land Bridge.The park's McLoughlin House Unit in Oregon City, Oregon, is open Fridays and Saturdays from 10 am to 4 pm. The house is closed seasonally from mid-December through mid-February. Please call (503) 656-5151 for more information. Annual ClosuresEach year, Fort Vancouver NHS and its managed facilities are open to the public except for the following days:  Thanksgiving DayDecember 24, 25, 31January 1
